targets.query:
from(bucket: "wifininja")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wlcData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "authClients" or r["_field"] == "deleteClients" or r["_field"] == "ipLearnClients" or r["_field"] == "mobilityClients" or r["_field"] == "randomMacClients" or r["_field"] == "runClients" or r["_field"] == "webAuthClients")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["wlcName"] == "WLC9800")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "wifininja")
